title: Antique/Art Deco Style Font
content:
Hello everyone! This is my first post, and I'm usually pretty resourceful at finding fonts, but this one has me completely stumped. I think I've been searching for it for about two hours now, completely non-productive (haha). I am hoping someone could help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015092305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/comebearwitness_6050.jpg)
author: lexspicoli
